product_name: BugBand Insect Repellent Diffuser Refill Cartridges
long_description: The BugBand Insect Repellent Diffuser Refill cartridges are designed specifically for the BugBand Portable Insect Repellent diffuser (sold separately). When used with the diffuser, a single cartridge repels insects for up to 120 hrs. and covers an area of 200 - 300 sq. ft. Cartridges contain geraniol, a natural ingredient derived from geranium oil; geraniol produces a pleasant natural fragrance. Package includes 6 BugBand Insect Repellent Diffuser refill cartridges.
short_description: The BugBand Insect Repellent Diffuser Refill cartridges are designed specifically for the BugBand Portable Insect Repellent diffuser (sold separately).
